contacts.address: 238 Mayon Street, Quezon City, Metro Manilla

socialtext: Let’s get in touch! Follow us on social media to see all the latest projects
contacts_small_title: We will make your dream vision and your dream designs into reality!
about_us_paragraph: CALO Design is a Manila-based designers' hub, specializing in cutting edge designs and implementing interior design projects. We combine aesthetics and ergonomics of comfort in houses, condominiums, offices, and retail spaces that we work on. We believe in the importance of creating diversified styles with high quality, and fast-paced delivery of collaterals to our clients.
about_us_paragraph_2: “According to some of them, one of our main advantages is our ability to combine unique elements of client’s requests and deliver our collaterals fast”
